conteudo.java.lang.String: Notifying users about the execution time of the requests. There will be a monitor that automatically rank the requests based on rules defined by the customer and notify the requesting user.
Possibility to insert Custom Logo on all system reports.
Creation of a new module Trips.
Greater control of the Head of request during all stages of the flow, so it is possible that the filter requests for service can be more efficient.
Treatment for cases of lack of sources for reporting. The Citsmart goes on to define a known source as standard.
Validation groups bond contracts at the time of exclusion contracts.
Verification of opening more than one call to the same user or device, avoiding the creation of duplicate calls.
Sending automatic alert to the manager of the help desk when a call is close to exceed a preset limit.

New report called "Change / Configuration Item" which is in Report -> Configuration -> Change / Configuration Item. This list is responsible for the configuration items registered on the requisition of the change that is in "Change Management -> Change Management -> Register New Change -> Relate ICs."
New routine for auditing configuration items automatically.
New button on the main screen Citsmart to inform the user that the extension is thus the CITSMart activates the scan task and only show call alerts when it is addressed to him.
Added on every screen registration treating quotes coming from Word (quotes curves or English).

If Citsmart is accessed by browser whose version is incompatible, it reports a message directing the user to perform the update, specifically for IE, the system will add a verification message Compatibility Mode, and prevent the user from performing in Login tool.

At the opening of Requests in Email Notification, the third option (Send mail in other shares service request / incident) now comes pre-selected. This follows the pattern of the other two options for E-mail notification.
On screen change request, tab Relate CI, was added one more button, which will bring a popup with all the information that the IC is bound to change, at any stage of change.

Now Citsmart allows the user logged can open a new request from an incoming call via Asterisk. When Citsmart identifies that there is a new link to the User logged in, a check is performed from Extension Telephone or that is linking the information obtained from the Contributor, such as Contract Name and E-mail.
In System -> Database -> Data Management, the option to export the data, and XML, is also available in the form of SQL.
The search system parameter is now returned to the ordering by id and the return column id is on the right side of the column marking.
The portal was created a button to direct the screen OS Arriving screen should now display the selected contract, and also appears div OS selected.
If the User choose to reclassify a Request, the Clear button is hidden to prevent the user attempts to write a Request with incomplete information.

Now Citsmart to work with e-mail protocol TLS / SSL. Changed the way authentication. Parameters changed: 11 - "requires authentication for sending email (eg S or N - Default: 'N'), 91 -" [Parameter Deprecated] GMAIL SMTP - Sending and receiving e-mails using GMAIL? (Ex: Y or N) "New parameters: 201 -" The Email Authentication Uses TLS / ssl? (Ex: Y or N - Default 'N'). "
In Search of Satisfaction: When viewing a message of thanks, close the search window.
Retrieved special character of the description of the problem to be created so automatically.
Standardization of the sources of the reports, all reports to the same source.
Add Internationalisation in Spanish.

Implemented a new parameter: Enable routine to read new emails automatically? (Eg, S or N - N Default is necessary to be enabled to function. A thread will check if the User has the java 7, it is necessary to work. After so she will check if imap or pop3, if it checks every second, for testing, but it should work every minute the email will verify the title of the email, and get the number, check for this solicitation and include the occurrence of this particular email solicitation. Later is necessary to make verification of the solicitation number in the email body.

New functionality in routine automatic execution of scripts made ​​by Citsmart. Now the system will validate if indeed the necessary negotiations were made with respect to the lack of permissions to the database and scripts not executed when running automatic. The validation does not happen until the negotiations needed to be made.
Improved performance of grid service management.

Clarification of e-mail submissions and finalization of actions that are only sent to the applicant and not to the group, and that the patterns of email use are defined in the screen "Edit Service" screen of Contract Administration.

Improvement - The parameters of the system are validating the enumerated types defined in the configuration (Routine internal system), eg if you set up the type number the system will only accept numbers in the value field of the configuration screen regalia.
Creation of feature discovery Equipment and Inventory collection.
Improvements implemented in lookups for the query to be performed disregarding accents. For example, to consult with the words data or information, the query should return the result information.
Was added in the registry and restore the group to wait a screen to prevent the User click more than once while the system is processing the information.
Solution of the following inconsistency: When the number of employees assigned to a group was too large, the system could present undesirable behavior with a possible buffer overflow.
Now you can have access to the JBoss log and also know which DBMS in the customer environment. On the System menu -> Environment Settings.
Added the screen origin of requests to the system menu path Process Management -> Incident Management -> Origin of requests withdrawal of permission to any user creation.
Added the ID column in the lookup search Origin onscreen Registration Request Service.
Created the field "Location" on the "Search Requests / Incidents" to filter searches by location.
The change was made to keep the formatting of the description field of the service request in the search screen prompts. But that was aligned to the report should not be changed due to performance.

Change in the way the attachments Knowledge Bases are recorded. Before the file name was not recorded, but the duplication of description. Now the file name is recorded and can be used in research knowledge.
Created one more column "Work by OS" screen linking resource planning / project schedule.
The report was made to inform all SLAs late and without delayed returning in percentage and in quantity by priority.

Added a new button on the screen of the Add Multiple Services Contract to assist the user of the system installation process. The user need not add one by one, with the option to add all Asset Services. In addition, we performed several improvements on the screen informing the user when the system is processing some information. Was also performed for improved LOOKUP_SERVICO that was only listed the services were not deleted.

Was performed for an improvement when the service request is closed and placed as Resolved, information description of the problem and solution / response will be sent to the knowledge base. PARAMETERS: id = 182 Description = Folder to be saved and solution description of the service request in the Knowledge Base.
At the request screen by the portal was added a button to link attachments.
Improvement in query screens Lookup. The query in the following screens are being carried out with or without words with accents (Example: information and information should bring the same result).
Standard sign in requests you can edit the contact information. The register of requests is the portal was not allowing these changes.

Improved handling of queries Lookups. Queries that possessed by three conditions in WHERE, for example, were not performed correctly because of the absence of a parenthesis from the second condition as below.
